Text: I was gonna say "finally a good rip" but this one is no better than the other versions on the net.It's just like the version on foreignmoviesll but the subs are not hard.

Dangerzone, it's no need download program to insert the subtitles in the movies. It's just necessary that the file movie ("avi") and the file subtitle ("srt") have the same name and characters, "exactly equal", includind the points, if any. Simple that! Ok?
